TopicTitle: Tips for going to duna in career mode

Articles.Content: Hi my name is Mark Watney just joined today and I really enjoy KSP
Hey guys do you have any tips for going to duna in career mode

Hello Mr. Watney. 

Your posts have been moved to their own thread, as is customary for new member greetings.

Hello MarkWatney and welcome to the forum!

As far as getting to Duna, there are a number of steps involved.  If there is a specific issue giving you trouble, you could, perhaps, find an answer in the Gameplay Questions section of the forum.  If you can't find an answer to a specific question there, feel free to post the question yourself.

If it's less specific advice you need, try taking a look around the Tutorials section.

Happy landings!
Hi, @MarkWatney! Honestly, I didn't think that getting there would be your problem.
Thanks guys I'll be sure to take your advice

If you are going interplanetary you should probably install an information mod (Kerbal engineer redux or mechjeb) that gives you the Delta V and thrust to weight ratio of your craft so you can make sure you can get there and take off again in Duna's atmosphere.  I would send a probe first to scan for ore and add a mining rig to the lander so you can refuel and land on Ike too.
